anime.name: Luffy
anime.description: Luffy is the protagonist of One Piece, a pirate aiming to become the Pirate King.

anime.name: Solo Living
anime.description: The protagonist of Solo Leveling, he starts as a weak hunter but becomes the world's strongest.

anime.name: Gojo
anime.description: Gojo is one of the strongest jujutsu sorcerers, with immense power and the Six Eyes.

anime.name: Light Yagami
anime.description: Light Yagami is a highly intelligent student who gains the Death Note and uses it to create a utopia.
